mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.office_no AS "officeNo", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.site_no AS "siteNo", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o2.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_no( id, office_id, office_no, order_no, site_no, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{officeNo}, #{orderNo}, #{siteNo}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_no SET office_id = #{office.id}, office_no = #{officeNo}, order_no = #{orderNo}, site_no = #{siteNo}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
